descriptions.title: money-watch
descriptions.description: Finance Management app. Features transaction entryand multiple bank accounts. Log in via Google, or browse anonymously. Actively being developed. Check it out!

descriptions.title: meal-simple
descriptions.description: A to be mealplanner app with user accounts that will have ability to share recipes

descriptions.title: justDoIt
descriptions.description: To-do list app that stores items in local storage.

descriptions.title: Farm Fight
descriptions.description: 1v1 your friend and race to completely infect the other's farm whilst caring for your own.

descriptions.title: Sims4 Pregnancy Mod
descriptions.description: My first game mod. Pregnancy mod to allow sims to repopulate in sims4. May be rendered non-functional, or obselete, depending on game updates.
